info.title: Wishlist API
info.description:
## Wishlist API
  
The Wishlist API allows a developer to create and manage customer [Wishlists](https://support.bigcommerce.com/s/article/Wishlists). A Wishlist allows you to see what your customers are interested in and saving on the store. With this information you’ll be able to create targeted campaigns to help merchants grow their business.
  Customer API OAuth scopes give you access to Wishlists API. See[OAuth Scopes](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication#authentication_oauth-scopes)

post.description:
Creates a [*Wishlist*](/api-reference/customer-subscribers/wishlist-api/models/wishlist) and [*Wishlist Item*](/api-reference/customer-subscribers/wishlist-api/models/wishlistitem). More than one item can be added in the POST.

**Required Fields**
* name
* customer_id

is_public.description: Whether the wishlist is available to the public.

variant_id.description: The variant ID of the product.

id.description: Wishlist ID, provided after creating a wishlist with a POST.

customer_id.description: The ID the customer to which the wishlist belongs.

is_public.description: Whether the Wishlist is available to the public.

token.description: The token of the Wishlist. This is created internally within BigCommerce. The Wishlist ID is to be used for external apps. Read-Only

variant_id.description: The variant ID of the item.

401.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid.

get.description: Returns a list of [*Wishlists*](/api-reference/customer-subscribers/wishlist-api/models/wishlist). Optional filter parameters can be passed in.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: All wishlists relating to the customer.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of results per page. 1 is the default and starts from record 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return per page. Default is 50 and maximum is 250.

id.description: Wishlist ID, provided after creating a wishlist with a POST.

is_public.description: Whether the Wishlist is available to the public.

token.description: The token of the Wishlist. This is created internally within BigCommerce. The Wishlist ID is to be used for external apps. Read-Only

variant_id.description: The variant ID of the item.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

put.description:
Updates a [*Wishlist*](/api-reference/customer-subscribers/wishlist-api/models/wishlist).

Use this endpoint to update an existing wishlist items, change the wishlist name, customer ID or if the wishlist is available publicly.

**Required Fields**
* customer_id

is_public.description: Whether the wishlist is available to the public.

variant_id.description: The variant ID of the item.

id.description: Wishlist ID, provided after creating a wishlist with a POST.

customer_id.description: The ID the customer to which the wishlist belongs.

is_public.description: Whether the Wishlist is available to the public.

token.description: The token of the Wishlist. This is created internally within BigCommerce. The Wishlist ID is to be used for external apps. Read-Only

variant_id.description: The variant ID of the item.
